comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Thank you to everyone who take part in the first iteration of this!If you haven't done so already, please update your post with a new screenshot of your bet showing that you only lost 1 leg out of they 5 (if it applies to you).Some things will be considered before the next matchday but I appreciate all of you nonetheless
